title: [Large-scale] Understanding social dynamics through synchronous online experiential learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Pedagogical Theories and Understanding of Social Interaction Principles
context.additional_context: Utilizing real-time collaboration tools in a BYOD environment and conducting social conflict management simulations

learning_goals: Learners can explain group-level social processes by analyzing competitive-cooperative dynamics in synchronous virtual classrooms.
Learners can design and apply moral leadership strategies in simulated online environments.
Learners can critically connect group dynamic phenomena from experiential learning activities to similar real-world societal cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
